author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-MCI.CreditVentures 2.0 FIZ Plans To Sell Its Entire Stake In Genomed
text:
May 28 (Reuters) - GENOMED SA:
* SAID ON FRIDAY MCI.CREDITVENTURES 2.0 FIZ (FUND) ACCEPTED AN OFFER FROM DIAGNOSTYKA SP. Z O.O. TO BUY THE FUNDâ€™S ENTIRE STAKE IN CO
* THE FUND HOLDS 460,889 SHARES IN CO * BOTH PARTIES PLAN TO FINALISE THE TRANSACTION IN COMING WEEKS
